title: Please could someone identify this font
content:
Hi everyone,

Iâ€™m new here and while I am busy trying to understand fonts and their histories, I am having trouble identifying them. I guess that will only come with experience. However, I wonder if anyone would be so kind as to identify the following font for me?

I have included two examples for your attention.

Kind Regards
